rukus.text: Alloh savgand jod mekunad: Savgand ʙa anciru zajtun
va savgand ʙa kuhi Turi Sino, ki dar on co Alloh ʙevosita ʙo Muso alajhissalom suxan guft
Savgand ʙa in sahri emin az hamai xavf, ki Makka ast
ki mo odamiro ʙa tahqiq dar nekutarin surate ʙijofaridem
On goh uro ʙa sui duzax gardonidem, agar az ito'ati Parvardigoras va az pajravii rasuli Alloh ruj gardonad
magar onon, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista kardaand, pas ʙaroi onon podosi ʙepojon ast
Ej inson, pas cist, ki ʙa'd az in hama pandu nasihat turo ʙa duruƣ sumoridani qijomat vomedorad
Ojo Alloh hukmkunandatarini hokimon nameʙosad dar hama cize, ki ofaridast? Bale alʙatta meʙosad
